# Commit Message Template

## Format
[TICKET_ID]: Short and clear description of the change

### Example
DEV-014: Refactor player FSM and implement block mechanic

---

## Recommended structure (optional but helpful)

**What was done**
- ...

**Why it was done**
- ...

**Impact**
- ...

---

## Rules
- Always start with the ticket ID.
- Use English.
- Use imperative form (e.g., "Add", "Fix", "Update").
- Keep the title short and objective.
- One commit per logical change.
